General.Name: Edifier Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Edifier Technology Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells audio equipment in China. It offers wired and wireless headphones; bookshelf, computer, and gaming speakers; studio monitors and PA speakers; speakers for TV and home theater; gaming headphones and earphones; and on-ear and over-ear headphones. Edifier Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Ms. Xiao Hong Wang
2.Title: Assistant Sr. Mang., HR Department & Director
